MOP Vaishnav College for Women

Nungambakkam High Road, Chennai
A NAAC accredited
A premier Institute in higher education, M.O.P. Vaishnav College for Women is grounded in Chennai, Tamil Nadu since 1992. A student can pursue any program from the Institute which Degree courses including 12 UG and 8 PG courses. These programs are offerred in Full Time mode. M.O.P. Vaishnav College for Women is a reputed institute for B.Com, M.A., M.Sc., B.A., BCA, M.Com, BBA, B.Sc., MBA/PGDM courses. Students can chose from these programs to persue their career in higher studies. Institute enjoys a good reputation for courses like B.Com, M.A., M.Sc., B.A., BCA, M.Com, BBA, B.Sc., MBA/PGDM in the streams of Accounting & Commerce, Humanities & Social Sciences, IT & Software, Mass Communication & Media, Business & Management Studies, Science, Engineering Students can opt courses from these. M.O.P. Vaishnav College for Women gave you offer to gained expertize through its trained and experienced faculty in the fields of Media Planning, Mathematics, Food Technology, Computer Science, Food & Nutrition. Institue offered courses that are approved by AICTE. Courses offered by M.O.P. Vaishnav College for Women for total of 60 candidates. Courses offered by the Institute are in the fee range of INR 123,800 for a total of 60 candidates. Institute has a well supported campus with facilities like Auditorium, Cafeteria, Hostel, Labs, Library, Sports Complex, Wi-Fi Campus.
Admission to all the B.Tech Programmes for the year 2024 is based on any one of the following: MOP Vaishnav college offers postgraduate course in the field of Business Administration. The MBA course offered by MOP Vaishnav College is generally for a duration of three years. The Anna University of Tamil Nadu conducts an admission test for the candidates seeking admission in MBA program which is called Tamil Nadu Common Entrance Test (TANCET). Admission to the MBA program at the college is based on the score obtained by the candidates in TANCET, based on which the candidates are called up for counselling.
